member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answer.NAME
member.summary: A domain name to which this resource record pertains.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answer.QTYPE
member.summary: This field specifies the meaning of the data in the RDATA field.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answer.CLASS
member.summary: Two octets which specify the class of the data in the RDATA field.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answer.TTL
member.summary: a 32 bit unsigned integer that specifies the time interval (in seconds) that the resource record may be cached before it should be discarded.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answer.RDLENGTH
member.summary: An unsigned 16 bit integer that specifies the length in octets of the RDATA field.

member.name: T:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answers
member.summary: This class holds Dns answers returned by server.

member.name: M:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answers.ParseAnswers(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.returns: Returns true if answer parsed successfully.

member.name: M:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Answers.GetMxRecordsFromAnswers
member.summary: Gets MX records from answer collection and ORDERS them by preference.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.ID
member.summary: A 16 bit identifier assigned by the program that generates any kind of query. This identifier is copied the corresponding reply and can be used by the requester to match up replies to outstanding queries.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.OPCODE
member.summary: A four bit field that specifies kind of query in this message. This value is set by the originator of a query and copied into the response.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.RCODE
member.summary: Response code - this 4 bit field is set as part of responses.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.QDCOUNT
member.summary: an unsigned 16 bit integer specifying the number of entries in the question section.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.ANCOUNT
member.summary: an unsigned 16 bit integer specifying the number of resource records in the answer section.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.NSCOUNT
member.summary: an unsigned 16 bit integer specifying the number of name server resource records in the authority records section.

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.Dns_Header.ARCOUNT
member.summary: an unsigned 16 bit integer specifying the number of resource records in the additional records section.

member.name: M:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.DnsCache.GetMXFromCache(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to get MX records from cache, if any.
member.returns: Returns null if not in cache.

member.name: M:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.DnsCache.AddMXToCache(System.String,LumiSoft.Net.Dns.MX_Record[])
member.summary: Adds domain's MX records to cache.

member.name: M:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.DnsEx.GetMXRecords(System.String,LumiSoft.Net.Dns.MX_Record[]@)
member.summary: Gets MX records.(MX records are sorted by preference, lower array element is prefered)

member.name: P:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.DnsEx.UseDnsCache
member.summary: Gets or sets if to use dns caching.

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.QTYPE.CNAME
member.summary: the canonical name for an alias

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.QTYPE.SOA
member.summary: marks the start of a zone of authority

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.RCODE.FORMAT_ERRROR
member.summary: Format error - The name server was unable to interpret the query.

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.RCODE.SERVER_FAILURE
member.summary: Server failure - The name server was unable to process this query due to a problem with the name server.

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.RCODE.NAME_ERROR
member.summary: Name Error - Meaningful only for responses from an authoritative name server, this code signifies that the domain name referenced in the query does not exist.

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.RCODE.NOT_IMPLEMENTED
member.summary: Not Implemented - The name server does not support the requested kind of query.

member.name: F:LumiSoft.Net.Dns.RCODE.REFUSED
member.summary: Refused - The name server refuses to perform the specified operation for policy reasons.
